description: 10-day solo luxury itinerary through Malaysia (Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Langkawi) focusing on premium accommodations, fine dining, exclusive tours, and top sights within a $2000 budget.

activities: Arrive in Kuala Lumpur. Check-in at Mandarin Oriental. Evening: Petronas Twin Towers tour and fine dining.
itinerary.transportation: Airport transfer, Grab rides in city.
itinerary.notes: Luxury experience prioritized in stays, dining, and activities.

activities: Explore Batu Caves. Afternoon spa session at hotel. Dinner at Skillet At163.
Visit Thean Hou Temple. Shopping at Pavilion Kuala Lumpur.
Morning flight to Penang. Check-in at Eastern & Oriental Hotel. Explore George Town UNESCO heritage area.
itinerary.transportation: Flight to Penang, transfer to hotel.
itinerary.notes: Book flight in advance for best rate.

activities: Visit Kek Lok Si Temple. Penang Street Art tour. Food tasting tour in the evening.
Relax at Batu Ferringhi Beach. Colonial mansion afternoon tea. Night market excursion.
Fly to Langkawi. Check-in at The Datai Langkawi. Enjoy Tanjung Rhu Beach.
itinerary.transportation: Flight to Langkawi, transfer to hotel.
itinerary.notes: Check flight and ferry schedules in advance.

activities: Langkawi SkyCab and SkyBridge. Island hopping tour to Pulau Dayang Bunting and Pulau Beras Basah.
Spa session at The Datai Langkawi.
itinerary.notes: Book adventure tours, transfers, and spa session in advance.

activities: Fly back to Kuala Lumpur. Return to Mandarin Oriental. Enjoy hotel spa and leisure.
itinerary.transportation: Flight to Kuala Lumpur, transfer to hotel.

activities: Luxury shopping at Suria KLCC. Afternoon: Attend a traditional Malaysian cultural show. Spa session at Mandarin Oriental. Night: Departure.
itinerary.transportation: Grab rides in city, airport transfer.
itinerary.notes: Ensure enough time for departure preparations and spa appointment. Pre-book spa session.
